title: What really grinds my gears
body: People that dont end a aram to try to fish/snipe/grab/dive to get a kill,  not end the game and stopping people from getting on with they'r life. Like godamit can you not.

replies.body: Only morons and bad silvers try to end games in arams. You aren't even meant to hit the nexus, everybody knows that.
How to ARAM101: Flash or you're not having fun.
ARAM; game mode of the eunach.
